name: Racket Club
abstract: Racket Club takes all the fun of tennis or pickleball and puts it in a box to create a brand new racket sport, built from the ground up for VR. Step onto the court and get swingin’!

detail.app_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, German, Japanese, Korean, French, Spanish
detail.app_release_note:
1️⃣ Match preferences:
Ranked/Practice
Ultra Rally / Single Point
No back wall/ Slap that back wall
Free serve / Ground Serve

2️⃣ Racket Orientation Calibration:
A tool that can be used to adjust the orientation of your racket with respect to your controller. This tool can help adjust the positioning of the racket when you use an adapter. You can save up to 3 presets.

3️⃣ Private doubles matches:
You can now invite 3 other friends to join you in a private doubles match. Use 'invite to court' to bring them to the court

4️⃣ New Doubles Leaderboard

5️⃣ New player profile design:
Shows your progress in career and multiplayer, and also your win percentage in singles and doubles. More stats will be added to this profile over time.

6️⃣ Drills in singles courts

7️⃣ Membership Tier 7 with new cosmetics and a little thank you gift for the hard work from our friends at XRL & Frozen League

8️⃣  Updated 'World tour' level bot: tell us about the difficulty

9️⃣   ... and many many bug fixes
